name: KEOS
description:
Keos is a fantastic medieval game where magic and swords exist and where darkness fights with light. Our protagonist is a character from the race of light, they live in a place where there are few magicians and they are extremely weak because they can only use one or two spells at most during their lifetime. He lives peacefully at his young age with his family which consists of his father a commoner who rose to high ranks in the kingdom and his mother the daughter of a nobleman. The story takes a turn when the character's family is murdered by a mysterious group. So this is adopted by a being of darkness who ran into him when he was escaping through the forest. He will discover that not everything is black and white in this dark world due to his new teacher. He will do his best to stop the group and save everyone.

Magic will make the combinations diverse. For example, there will be a force capable of moving objects if steam magic is used in combination with water and fire magic. There will be a fireball if you combine air and fire
